config.showNumbering.description: Whether to display multi-level title numbers in the outline view (e.g., 1.1, 1.2.1). **Requires reopening .do files**
config.updateFileContent.description: When numbering is enabled, automatically update section titles in .do files to include numbers. **Requires reopening .do files**
config.showRunButton.description: Whether to show the run button in the editor title bar.
config.stataPathOnWindows.description: **[Windows]** Path to Stata executable file (e.g., `C:\Program Files\Stata17\StataMP-64.exe`).
config.activateStataWindow.description: Activate the Stata window after running code (bring it to the foreground).
config.commentStyle.description: Comment style used for toggling comments. Options include `//`, `*`, or `/* ... */`
config.separatorLength.description: Total character length of the separator line (including the '** #' prefix and separators).
config.customCommands.description: User-defined Stata commands to highlight as keywords (array of strings). These commands will use the **same color** as built-in commands (like regress, summarize). Case-insensitive matching supported. Example: ["reghdfe", "ivreg2", "outreg2"]. **Requires reloading window** (Ctrl+Shift+P â†’ Developer: Reload Window)
config.enableCompletion.description: Enable Stata code completion (autocomplete suggestions for commands, functions, and keywords).
config.stataStepDelayOnWindows.descripti: **[Windows]** Delay in milliseconds between each PowerShell command execution step. Increase this value if you experience issues on slower machines (default: 100ms, minimum: 50ms).
